recommendations.name: Santorini, Greece
recommendations.description: A stunning Greek island known for its white-washed buildings, blue domes, and breathtaking sunsets over the Aegean Sea. Perfect for romantic getaways with its beautiful beaches and charming villages.

recommendations.name: Kyoto, Japan
recommendations.description: Ancient capital of Japan featuring traditional temples, beautiful gardens, and the famous cherry blossom season. Home to over 2,000 temples and shrines including the famous Golden Pavilion.

recommendations.name: Banff National Park, Canada
recommendations.description: Breathtaking mountain landscapes, crystal-clear lakes, and world-class hiking trails in the Canadian Rockies. Perfect for outdoor enthusiasts and nature lovers.

recommendations.name: Bali, Indonesia
recommendations.description: Tropical paradise with stunning beaches, ancient temples, lush rice terraces, and vibrant culture. Famous for its beautiful coastal areas and spiritual temples.

recommendations.name: Machu Picchu, Peru
recommendations.description: Ancient Incan citadel perched high in the Andes Mountains, one of the New Seven Wonders of the World. A sacred site with incredible historical and spiritual significance.

recommendations.name: Swiss Alps, Switzerland
recommendations.description: Majestic mountain peaks, pristine lakes, charming villages, and world-class skiing and hiking opportunities. Perfect for mountain lovers and outdoor enthusiasts.

recommendations.name: Maldives
recommendations.description: Tropical paradise with crystal-clear turquoise waters, pristine white sand beaches, and luxurious overwater bungalows. Perfect for beach lovers and honeymooners.

recommendations.name: Angkor Wat, Cambodia
recommendations.description: Magnificent temple complex and the largest religious monument in the world. Features stunning ancient temples and intricate stone carvings dating back to the 12th century.

recommendations.name: Maui, Hawaii
recommendations.description: Beautiful Hawaiian island known for its stunning beaches, volcanic landscapes, and world-class surfing. Features both black sand and golden sand beaches.

recommendations.name: Bagan, Myanmar
recommendations.description: Ancient city with over 2,000 Buddhist temples and pagodas spread across the plains. One of the most spectacular temple sites in Southeast Asia.
